languages.text: "Машина хранила темные и опасные знания. Если бы кто-то наложил лапу на эту мерзость, она принесла бы лишь вред".
"The machine held dark and dangerous knowledge. If anyone had laid their hands on that foulness, it would have caused nothing but harm."
languages.original_text: "Машина хранила темные и опасные знания. Если бы кто-то наложил лапу на эту мерзость, она принесла бы лишь вред".

traits.locale_text: "The machine held dark and dangerous knowledge. If anyone had laid their hands on that foulness, it would have caused nothing but harm."
"The machine held dark and dangerous knowledge. If anyone had laid their hands on that foulness, it would have caused nothing but harm."
"The machine held dark and dangerous knowledge. If anyone had laid their hands on that foulness, it would have caused nothing but harm."
"The machine held dark and dangerous knowledge. If anyone had laid their hands on that foulness, it would have caused nothing but harm."

languages.text: “那台机器中充满了黑暗与危险的知识。如果有人触碰了这种受诅咒的东西，只会受到伤害。”
languages.original_text: "The machine held dark and dangerous knowledge. If anyone had laid their hands on that foulness, it would have caused nothing but harm."

traits.locale_text: “那台机器中充满了黑暗与危险的知识。如果有人触碰了这种受诅咒的东西，只会受到伤害。”

languages.text: «La máquina albergaba un conocimiento oscuro y peligroso. Si alguien hubiera tocado esa abominación, nada bueno habría sucedido».
languages.original_text: "The machine held dark and dangerous knowledge. If anyone had laid their hands on that foulness, it would have caused nothing but harm."

traits.locale_text: «La máquina albergaba un conocimiento oscuro y peligroso. Si alguien hubiera tocado esa abominación, nada bueno habría sucedido».

languages.text: 「機械には危険な暗黒の知識が含まれていた。あの悪意のかたまりが誰かの手に渡れば、悪影響しか及ぼさない」
languages.original_text: "The machine held dark and dangerous knowledge. If anyone had laid their hands on that foulness, it would have caused nothing but harm."

traits.locale_text: 「機械には危険な暗黒の知識が含まれていた。あの悪意のかたまりが誰かの手に渡れば、悪影響しか及ぼさない」

languages.text: "Die Maschine enthielt finsteres und gefährliches Wissen. Hätte jemand seine Hände auf diese Verderbtheit gelegt, wäre daraus nichts als Unheil erwachsen."
languages.original_text: "The machine held dark and dangerous knowledge. If anyone had laid their hands on that foulness, it would have caused nothing but harm."

traits.locale_text: "Die Maschine enthielt finsteres und gefährliches Wissen. Hätte jemand seine Hände auf diese Verderbtheit gelegt, wäre daraus nichts als Unheil erwachsen."

languages.text: « Cette machine renfermait des connaissances bien trop dangereuses. Si elles étaient tombées entre d'autres mains, nous aurions couru au désastre. »
languages.original_text: "The machine held dark and dangerous knowledge. If anyone had laid their hands on that foulness, it would have caused nothing but harm."

traits.locale_text: « Cette machine renfermait des connaissances bien trop dangereuses. Si elles étaient tombées entre d'autres mains, nous aurions couru au désastre. »

languages.text: "Makine, karanlık ve tehlikeli bilgiler barındırıyordu. O ahlaksızlıklar, birilerinin eline geçmeleri durumunda yıkım yaratmakta kullanılacaktı."
languages.original_text: "The machine held dark and dangerous knowledge. If anyone had laid their hands on that foulness, it would have caused nothing but harm."

traits.locale_text: "Makine karanlık ve tehlikeli bilgiler barındırıyordu. O ahlaksızlıklar birilerinin eline geçseydi kaçınılmaz olarak yıkım yaratmakta kullanılırlardı."
